short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy crypto toolbox, with a hex to number conversion, Etherscan queries, decrypt 4-bytes function signature and Zeromev search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy and simple crypto toolbox, with a hex to number conversion, Etherscan queries, decrypt 4-bytes function signatures and Zeromev searches
